meta.title: Talks | Jacek Janczura
meta.description: Technical talks on AI architecture, distributed systems, and blockchain. Sharing practical lessons from enterprise deployments.

talks.title: AI Architecture Patterns
talks.description: Practical lessons from enterprise LLM deployments: multi-tenant architecture, cost optimization, observability, and governance patterns that scale.
talks.videoTitle: AI Architecture Patterns - Enterprise LLM Deployments

talks.title: Distributed Systems at Scale
talks.description: Throughput, latency, and resilience trade-offs in modern distributed systems. Event-driven architectures, back-pressure mechanisms, and observability patterns.
talks.videoTitle: Distributed Systems at Scale - Architecture Patterns

talks.title: Blockchain & Bitcoin
talks.description: Fundamentals of blockchain technology and Bitcoin, with enterprise use cases, smart contracts, and practical applications in modern software architecture.
talks.videoTitle: Blockchain & Bitcoin - Fundamentals and Enterprise Use Cases
